alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 11 at 1:37PM MST until March 12 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Harding County, Perkins County, Butte County and the Northern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins
